title: Did the Executive Director of Hardwick Clothes cut ties with the National Football Association about the "national" protests?
subtitle: The news reports accurately describe a decision taken by Tennessee Alan Jones' businessman.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2017, a Tennessee businessman and executive director of Hardwick Claus Allan Jones withdrew all the announcements relating to the National Football Association of its companies, in response to the protests of the "non-national" national anthem.
